name: pinstr
description: Decentralized, free, and open-source social network built on top of the Nostr Protocol for curating and sharing interests with the world.
readme_summary: Pinstr is a decentralized, open-source social network built on the Nostr protocol, designed for users to curate and share their interests. It allows users to create customized boards, engage with others through likes, comments, and Zaps, and attach Nostr profiles and notes to their boards. The platform aims to provide an easy-to-use interface for discovering and organizing new ideas and recommendations.
key_features: Create customized public boards of pins on almost any topic
Like, Comment, and Zap other users' boards
Ability to attach Nostr Profiles and Notes to boards
primary_use_case: Curating and sharing interests with others in a decentralized social network.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a vibrant community garden where people are planting seeds labeled with different interests (movies, music, Bitcoin, Nostr). These seeds grow into interconnected plants, forming a lush, thriving network. A central watering system, powered by a digital stream, nourishes the entire garden. Small screens embedded in the soil display user profiles and shared content. The scene is bathed in warm sunlight, creating a sense of collaboration and discovery. The composition is a wide-angle view, showcasing the interconnectedness of the garden. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with bright, cheerful colors and intricate details.

name: monolith
description: ⬛️ CLI tool and library for saving complete web pages as a single HTML file
readme_summary: Monolith is a CLI tool and library that saves complete web pages as single, self-contained HTML files. It embeds all CSS, image, and JavaScript assets directly into the HTML, allowing for offline viewing and easy sharing. This eliminates broken links and ensures the page renders correctly even without an internet connection.
key_features: Saves web pages as single HTML files
Embeds CSS, images, and JavaScript assets
Assets embedded as data URLs for offline viewing
primary_use_case: Saving complete web pages for offline access and archival purposes.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled artisan meticulously crafting a book. Instead of words, the artisan carefully weaves together vibrant threads of CSS, paints detailed images, and etches intricate JavaScript patterns onto the pages. The final product is a single, complete book, self-contained and ready to be shared. Tiny screens display snippets of HTML code subtly woven into the book's design. The scene is set in a cozy workshop filled with warm, inviting light. The image should be in a detailed digital painting style with a focus on texture and vibrant colors.

name: x8
readme_summary: x8 is a Rust-based hidden parameter discovery suite designed for web security testing. It offers features like flexible request configuration, high scalability, and accurate detection of hidden parameters, even those with non-random values. The tool aims to help security professionals uncover potential vulnerabilities and interesting functionalities often missed by other tools.
key_features: Flexible request configuration through templates and injection points
High accuracy compared to similar tools
Achieves almost raw requests through external library modification
primary_use_case: Identifying hidden parameters in web applications for security testing and bug bounty hunting.
cover_image_prompt: A detective meticulously examining a website's source code with a magnifying glass, revealing hidden parameters glowing with a faint light. The detective's notepad displays discovered parameters and potential vulnerabilities. Digital code snippets subtly float around the scene, connecting the investigation to software. The scene is set in a dimly lit office with a focused atmosphere. Small UI elements on nearby screens show the tool in action. The image should be in a digital painting style with clear outlines and a dark, mysterious color scheme.

name: Cosmos-Server
description: ☁️ The Most Secure and Easy Selfhosted Home Server. Take control of your data and privacy without sacrificing security and stability  (Authentication, anti-DDOS, anti-bot)
readme_summary: Cosmos-Server provides a secure and user-friendly platform for self-hosting applications on a home server. It offers features like an app store, storage management, reverse proxy with automatic HTTPS, and a robust authentication server. It aims to simplify self-hosting while prioritizing security and ease of use.
key_features: App Store for easy app installation and management
Storage Manager with Parity Disks and MergerFS support
Network Storages based on RClone for remote access
primary_use_case: Secure and easy self-hosting of a home server with application management, reverse proxy, and authentication features.
cover_image_prompt: A digital fortress protecting a cozy home from a stormy sea of cyber threats. Inside, a family enjoys seamless access to various apps displayed on glowing screens. The fortress walls are made of interconnected servers, subtly displaying lines of code and security metrics. A vigilant guardian stands watch, deflecting digital lightning bolts with a shimmering shield. The scene is set at twilight with warm, inviting light emanating from the home. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and rich details.
